projects.description: A random quote is generated after every 15 seconds or if the button is clicked
It provides a list of students which is paginated by displaying 10 students per page. User can also use a search bar to filter from students' list.
It displays a form which has input fields, dropdown menus and checkboxes. There is a submit button at the end of the form. If the user has missed required field the form will not submit

The player has to guess the phrase. Player will get 5 chances to guess, after every wrong answer a heart will be lost and after every correct guess the letter in the phrase will be displayed. Every time the player guess a letter, it will be disabled on the keyboard.
